plot: Shimon, a manipulative, TV-holic producer, and Limor, an assertive yet not-so-intelligent "frecha", review Israeli news, culture and media.
plot_en: Shimon, a manipulative, TV-holic producer, and Limor, an assertive yet not-so-intelligent "frecha", review Israeli news, culture and media.

title: Rak Beyisrael
